title: About VAST Data - Revolutionary Data Platform - VAST Data

structured_metadata.og_title: About VAST Data - Revolutionary Data Platform
structured_metadata.og_description: VAST democratizes fast access to all data. We apply unconventional thinking to break decades of tradeoffs that have been imposed by legacy architectures.
